Manipur University Recruitment 2025 ----Apply for Research Associate Post
Prasanna / All Government Jobs / Aug 21, 2025, 16:04 IST
 Manipur University
 1 Jobs |  Posted On : 21-Aug-2025 |  Manipur |  Salary : 37,000 to 37,000




FOLLOW

Manipur University has announced the official notification for 2025. To fill up the vacancies for Research Associate Jobs. Those candidates who have qualified in the Ph.D, M.Pharm, MVSc, M.E/ M.Tech can grab this chance and apply for the Manipur University Recruitment 2025. Here we include the age limit, selection process, salary structure, education details, application fee, and how to apply for these posts. Interested and eligible candidates can send yur resume to the email address before the last date. For more details, visit the official website.




If you are looking for more, here is a list of Government jobs in 2025 that you can all apply for. Use this link for more jobs in Manipur.

Manipur University Recruitment 2025  Eligibility Criteria
Name of the Posts	No.of Vacancies	Qualification
Research Associate 	01	Ph.D, M.Pharm, MVSc, M.E/ M.Tech

Age Limit for the Manipur University Recruitment 2025 

The Minimum Age Limit: 21 years.
The Maximum Age Limit: 35 years.

Selection Process for the Manipur University Recruitment 2025 

Intervew

Salary Structure for the Manipur University Recruitment 2025 

The Minimum Salary: Rs. 37,000 /- per month.

Application fee for the Manipur University Recruitment 2025 

There is no application fee.
How to Apply for the Manipur University Recruitment 2025 
Visit the official website.
Go to the recruitment career page.
Check for the Research Associate Jobs 2025.
Read the notification carefully.
Check the eligibility criteria.
If you meet the eligibility criteria.
Then, send your Cv along with the relevant documents to the email address given below.

Email Address

knd@manipuruniv.ac.in

Important Dates

Starting Date of Application	12-08-2025
Last Date of Application	26-08-2025

 

Official Notification	Click Here
Join Whatsapp Group	Join Now
Join on Telegram	Join Now
